00029 
00030     bool addOverflow(doubledigit_t &n1, doubledigit_t n2) {
00031         doubledigit_t t=(n1>>1)+(n2>>1);
00032         if ((n1&1) && (n2&1)) ++t;
00033         n1+=n2;
00034         if (t & doubledigit_hibit) return true;
00035         return false;
00036     }

00039 
00049 integer pow2(size_t e) {
00050     integer r;
00051     setbit(r, e);
00052     return r;
00053 }
00054 
00065 integer sqr(const integer& n) {
00066     n._throw_if_nan();
00067 
00068     const data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00069     std::vector<doubledigit_t> a(ndata->mLength*2+1, 0);
00070     doubledigit_t *adigit=&a[0];
00071 
00072     size_t i, j;
00073     integer addend;
00074     data_t *addenddata=addend._get_data();
00075     addenddata->alloc(ndata->mLength*2+1);
00076 
00077     digit_t *ndigitip=ndata->digits;
00078     for (i=0; i<ndata->mLength; ++i, ++ndigitip) {
00079         digit_t ndigiti=*ndigitip;
00080         doubledigit_t t=(doubledigit_t(ndigiti) * ndigiti);
00081         if (addOverflow(adigit[2*i], t)) ++addenddata->digits[2*i+2];
00082 
00083         for (j=i+1; j<ndata->mLength; ++j) {
00084             doubledigit_t t=(doubledigit_t(ndata->digits[j]) * ndigiti);
00085             if (t & doubledigit_hibit) ++addenddata->digits[i+j+2];
00086             t<<=1;
00087             if (addOverflow(adigit[i+j], t)) ++addenddata->digits[i+j+2];
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091     integer answer;
00092     data_t *answerdata=answer._get_data();
00093     answerdata->alloc(ndata->mLength*2+1);
00094 
00095     doubledigit_t carry=0;
00096     for (i=0, j=ndata->mLength*2+1; i<j; ++i) {
00097         if (addOverflow(carry, adigit[i])) ++addenddata->digits[i+2];
00098         answerdata->digits[i]=digit_t(carry);
00099         carry>>=bits_per_digit;
00100     }
00101 
00102     answerdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00103     addenddata->skipLeadingZeros();
00104     answer+=addend;
00105 
00106     return answer;
00107 }

00115 integer pow(const integer& n, const integer& e) {
00116     bool neg=(n.sign() < 0 && e.odd());
00117 
00118     size_t length=e._get_length(), lastBitCount=0;
00119     digit_t ee(e._get_digit(length-1));
00120     while (ee != 0) { ee >>= 1; ++lastBitCount; }
00121 
00122     integer p(abs(n)), answer=integer::one();
00123     for (size_t eIndex=0; eIndex < length; ++eIndex) {
00124         digit_t eee(e._get_digit(eIndex));
00125 
00126         int bitCount(int(eIndex == length-1 ? lastBitCount : bits_per_digit));
00127         while (bitCount-- > 0) {
00128             if (eee & 0x01) answer*=p;
00129             p=sqr(p);
00130             eee >>= 1;
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     answer._set_negative(neg);
00135     return answer;
00136 }

00149 integer factorial(size_t n) {
00150     integer r(integer::one());
00151     if (n == (std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)()) {
00152         // It's highly unlikely that the system will be able to calculate this,
00153         // or that anyone might want to, but someday it will be possible. This
00154         // code keeps the function from going into an infinite loop if/when that
00155         // happens.
00156         r=(std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)();
00157         --n;
00158     }
00159     for (size_t i=2; i<=n; ++i) r*=i;
00160     return r;
00161 }
